title: ChessBase 8 Lite (Spanish - ISO Image) [Shared by GuepardoMX].ra
description:
ChessBase 8 Lite is completely functional. Image ISO within file RAR only includes the Installer (Playbase and Fritz 6 SP were not added being obsolete and to save time when unloading). I recommend to mount the image decompressed with DAEMON Tools and behavior to install of normal way. If they need to update the version of the GUI they can make it from menu "Help" of ChessBase 8. That they enjoy it!
